attributes.action: Domestic Violence Offenders To Sign A Lifetime Register
attributes.additional_details:
Many offenders go in to repeat their abusive behaviours on different partners over the years . If regular checks were done it may save the lives of Women, Men and children. 
Many are unaware of their partners DV history, but if they knew would they seriously put themselves and their children at risk.
attributes.background: After being in a Mentally, Emotional and Physical relationship for a short time recently. I would like to get Domestic Violence awareness out there and to hopefully prevent abuse to others.I believe that Domestic Violence Offenders should sIgn a DV register a bit similar to sex offenders register.
